special_text:
[i](Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When Chronicles of the Kitsune enters the battlefield, create a 2/1 red and white Fox creature token.
{2}{W}: [i]Act I: Ascent[/i]
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have flying.
{3}{W}{W}: [i]Act II: Descent[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you control no creatures, create Hu Li, a legendary 4/4 white Fox Spirit creature token with flying and lifelink.
